entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending this evening then clearing. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023
